title: Decolonize Cricket: Re-name UDRS as the Weeraratna Rule
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – The ICC Champions Trophy has concluded and a feature article in a Sunday newspaper titled ‘Recognition of the Authorship of UDRS’ by a cricket observer, showcases some key facts that we need to take cognizance of in the realm of sports, particularly in the game of cricket….
